meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Adrien Schless-Meier Steven Wolfe Fred Vaughn Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7221.

td.p: Adrien Schless-Meier, a philanthropist from Washington, D.C.
Steven Wolfe, a lifeguard from Laguna Hills, California
Fred Vaughn, an Internet operations technician from Mineral Point, Wisconsin (whose 1-day cash winnings total $16,000)

tr.td: BEE WORDS
ANNUAL EVENTS
BILLS, BILLS, BILLS
WHAT'D I SAY?
ON THIS CONTINENT
"AT" THE MOVIES

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Adrien: What are bee stings?)
(Fred: What is...)
(Alex: Aw...)
(Fred: What is bee balm?)

hives

FredStevenAdrien
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Also called nettle rash, they\'re characterized by itchy red or white patches')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Also called nettle rash, they're characterized by itchy red or white patches

tr.td: Fred
Steven
Adrien

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Fred
Steven
Adrien
SPELLING BEE WORDS
(Alex: We had BEE WORDS in round one. Now we have [*], and yes, indeed, you have to spell the important word in the response.)
TREATIES
GEOGRAPHICAL MUSIC GROUPS
WOMEN AUTHORS
LANGUAGES
INVENTIVE MINDS

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
